name: Dragon Feeder
description:
Sneak out of the house to feed your dragon - but careful your mum doesn't catch you!

Made for Develop Game Jam 2017.

Theme: Risky Business

For  Windows, download and extract the associated data zip.

Credits: 

Caroline: Programmer, 2D ui assets, awesome Dragon!

Carl Bateman: Programmer!!!

Jason Compose: Sound designer!

Bambi: 3D assets and textures.
